content: \ My Profile SURESH SINGH MY PROFILE COURSES ONLINE PAPERS FUNDED PROJECTS DOWNLOAD PAGE MY PROFILE Professor Department of Computer Science Portland State University Portland, OR 97201 Email: lastname at cs dot pdx dot edu Academic Background I graduated with a bachelorâs degree in Computer Science from the Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur, India in 1984. I received my PhD in 1990 from the University of Massachusetts, Amherst. I have been a faculty at Oregon State University, University of South Carolina, and SUNY New Paltz. My current areas of research are in: Study the use of Terahertz frequencies for wireless networking. The goal is to deliver terabits/sec data rates to users using the enormous available spectrum. Suatainable natural language processing (NLP) Anomaly detection, classification under arbitrary distribution shift recycle dataset Terahertz, UWB Data 100-700 GHZ channel measurements including phase, various distances, horizontal offsets, and reflectionsTHz MIMO 100-2,000 GHZ channel measurements for different distances THz Time-Domain Ultra Wideband measurements for different distances, materials UWB Data MY PROFILECOURSESONLINE PAPERSFUNDED PROJECTSDOWNLOAD
